resources.string: Please, answer the following questions and click SUBMIT button
Which person selected the location which later became the District of Columbia (by act of Congress in 1790)?
What peoples conquered England at the Battle of Hastings in 1066?
Ancient Mesopotamian cultures including the Babylonians, Assyrians, and Sumerians lived along the shores of which two rivers?
The wife of Nicholas II was the last czarina of Russia (1894-1917). After the Bolshevik revolution, she and her family were imprisoned and executed. Enter her name.
Prohibition in the United States was a nationwide constitutional ban on the production, importation, transportation and sale of alcoholic beverages that remained in place from what years?
